code: import React from"react";import{Prism as SyntaxHighlighter}from"react-syntax-highlighter";import{tomorrow}from"react-syntax-highlighter/dist/esm/styles/prism";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CodeDisplay=_ref=>{let{problem}=_ref;if(!problem||!problem.code)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Code is loading..."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"bg-gray-900 text-white p-4 rounded-lg shadow-md border border-gray-700",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(SyntaxHighlighter,{language:"java",style:tomorrow,customStyle:{padding:"15px",borderRadius:"8px",fontSize:"14px",lineHeight:"1.5",overflowX:"auto"},children:[problem.code.replace(/```(java)?/g,"").trim()," "]})});};export default CodeDisplay;
